name: discount rate
notes: The discount rate for future costs and revenues (fuel costs, estimated health costs, etc).

name: cost per ton of CO2
notes: The assumed cost per ton of CO2 procuded by the power plant.

name: cost per MW PV system
notes: The per MW cost of the PV system

name: fixed (offset) cost of PV system
notes: The fixed cost of the PV system (can be negative).

name: cost per MW BESS
notes: The per MW cost of the BESS.

name: cost per MWh BESS
notes: The per MWh cost of the BESS.

name: fixed cost (offset) of the BESS
notes: The fixed (offset) cost of the BESS (can be negative).

name: BESS Round Trip Efficiency
notes: The round trip efficiency of the battery energy storage system
